mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reverseauction_register VALUES (0, #{memberId}, now(), null, #{reverseauctionTenderLimit}, #{reverseauctionTendercloseDate}, #{reverseauctionRoomingDate}, #{reverseauctionLeavingDate}, #{reverseauctionTitle}, #{doNo}, #{siNo}, #{guNo}, #{reverseauctionAddress}, #{reverseauctionAddressMore}, 0, #{reverseauctionContent}, 0, 1, "낙찰 대기")
